availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander M. Vanarsdall (Harrodsburg, Mercer County, KY, resident)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth Vanarsdall. Married to Elizabeth Bass Vanarsdall in Mercer County in November 1846. Resident of Mercer County in 1860. Member of board of directors of Harrodsburg Savings Institution in Harrodsburg, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 739.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Precinct No. 5, p. 516A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191859, p. 581.
KYR-0002-225-0043.
